title: Lenovo X1 Carbon, Intel Core i5, 16GB RAM, 250GB SSD, Windows 10 Pro
description: Our family of ThinkPad laptops is legendary in the industry. Known for being the world's #1 laptops for business ThinkPad laptops and workstations present an unmatched level of quality and reliability. For instance, the impressive battery life comes in handy when working on the road. The ThinkPad T Series (with dual battery) can last up to 30.3 hours on a single charge, which is unimaginable for most computer brands. Durable, ultralight, and blazing fast, ThinkPad is the ideal laptop for work.
